channel.title: FileSystem on 老实人
channel.description: Recent content in FileSystem on 老实人

item.title: btrfs USB无法挂载
item.description: 平台: ArchLinux - 5.1.15-arch1-1-ARCH 具体报错: mount: /mnt: mount(2) system call failed: File exists. 解决: sudo btrfstune -m /dev/sdc sudo mount /dev/sdc /mnt 参考: Error for mount: system call failed: File exists.
